data.title: Robert Perry on LinkedIn: Some BIG NEWS: I’ve formally accepted the position, Vice President of…
data.meta_description: Some BIG NEWS: I’ve formally accepted the position, Vice President of Creative Services for the new baseball team opening up in Fredericksburg, VA in April… | 16 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

Some BIG NEWS: I’ve formally accepted the position, Vice President of Creative Services for the new baseball team opening up in Fredericksburg, VA in April, 2020. While I am very excited and ready to put my “nose to the grindstone.” It’s also a bittersweet moment for me. These last three years in Jackson, TN have been very good to me. The Jackson Generals organization helped me grow professionally and personally. These past three years we’ve done great things. We’ve created great stories here. We’ve created lifelong memories. I’m very proud of the work we’ve accomplished here and the team is in great hands. Next year will be the greatest year yet for the Generals. That being said, Fredericksburg, I hope y’all are ready. 2020 is going to be HUGE. Let’s get it.
